  • Method Details

    • merge

      public static TextGrid merge​(TextGrid tg1, TextGrid tg2) throws PraatException
      Merge two textGrids. The new domain will be: [min(grid1->xmin, grid2->xmin), max(grid1->xmax, grid2->xmax)]. This implies that for the resulting TextGrid each interval tier will have one or two extra intervals if the domains of the two TextGrids are not equal,
      Throws:
      PraatException

    • createWithoutTiers

      Throws:
      PraatException

      Throws:
      PraatException

    • extendTime

      public void extendTime​(double delta_time, int position) throws PraatException
      Extend the begin-time (delta_time<0) or end-time (delta_time>0). For Point-tiers only the domain will be extended. Interval tiers will have a new (empty) interval at the start or the end.
      Throws:
      PraatException

    • setLaterEndTime

      public void setLaterEndTime​(double xmax, java.lang.String imark, java.lang.String pmark) throws PraatException
      Set the end time to a larger value. If mark is NULL, only times are changed If mark != NULL mark the previous start/end time For a TextTier this involves adding a point with the marker For an IntervalTier this involves adding a new interval
      Throws:
      PraatException

    • setEarlierStartTime

      public void setEarlierStartTime​(double xmin, java.lang.String imark, java.lang.String pmark) throws PraatException
      Set the start time to a smaller value. If mark is NULL, only times are changed If mark != NULL mark the previous start/end time For a TextTier this involves adding a point with the marker For an IntervalTier this involves adding a new interval
      Throws:
      PraatException

    • append_inplace

      public void append_inplace​(TextGrid thee, boolean preserveTimes) throws PraatException
      Throws:
      PraatException
